Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
aerospace \aerospace\ n. 1. the atmosphere and outer space considered together or as a whole. [WordNet 1.5]
2. the sector of industry that designs and builds aircraft, rockets, missiles, and devices or vehicles intended to operate in outer space. [WordNet 1.5]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: aerospace \aerospace\ a. of or pertaining to {aerospace} in either sense. [PJC]
aerospace n : the atmosphere and outer space considered as a whole
